resources.string: Write down your to-do list.\nSet it\'s importance and difficulty degree.\nAnd try to complete them.
What if your life is a game…\nWhat if your attributes can be measured by numbers…
Level up your attributes by complete your To-Do list.\nGain kinds of achievements and finally level up your life.
Share your daily or your colorful life online.\nJoin the online team to complete tasks together.

More functions:
- Sync exp, level to server
- Edit your profile
- Community
- Share your activities
We are sorry that the app crashed.\nPlease send us a report.
You need to login to enter this page!\nClick here to login.

Tips: After login you can access community.
Tips: You can undo tasks that completed today.

Tips: Step data is calculated from sensor data, it may be inaccurate if you launch app less frequently. Complete successfully All-Time Next 7 Days Ascending sort Descending sort Add tasks Click here to add tasks！ Navigation "Board: Places that you complete tasks just like RPGs
" "Status: Here to view your attributes exp and levels

" "Community: Join a team and complete team tasks

" "Statistics: Here to view your data statistics


" "Most function support using with network except community~
" "And most data is store in local storage space, be careful to uninstall without backup." Slide Bar Here stands entries to login, achievement, task history, setting and so on List Use list to classify your tasks More Time

By default it's showing all-time task, you can change to only today to show.

Show only Today's Tasks If checked, widget will only show tasks that already started or will start today. New Player Complete your first task Merchant Add a new item in the Shop Classification Add a new task list Upside down Change order of the list Little Assistant Create an application widget Fiddle With It Change any setting Save Game Backup your data Repent Force Set to COMPLETED Data Analysis View STATISTICS page New Alarm Clock Change Reminder System New Theme, New Mood Change theme color Good for Exercise Exchange STR Exp with step count Hey, turn off the lights! Change to dark theme Grateful Click Rate Us button Transport Move a task to other list Special Case Give up a task Tinker Edit Something
Habit Develop Create a repeatable task Habit Starter Complete a repeatable task 10 times Habit Scholar Complete a repeatable task 30 times Habit Bachelor Complete a repeatable task 90 times Habit Master Complete a repeatable task 365 times Bounty Mission Create a task with coin reward Counter Create a count task A Piece of Cake Create a task with no exp reward Impossible Create a task with Lv4 Difficulty and Importance degree Read It Later Receive shared information from other app to create a task. (e.g. Twitter, Chrome…) Working Day Create a daily task which set ignores (e.g. Every monday and Wednesday) Game Starter Got a 5 day finishing task streak Game Scholar Got a 15 day finishing task streak Game Bachelor Got a 60 day finishing task streak Game Master Got a 180 day finishing task streak

Your local data will not be synchronized with the server.
Delete Really going to delete this achievement?
You can use the [Data Backup] Page in the [Settings] Page to backup/restore your data.
 Now it support export your local data to a zip file, or sync the data with WebDAV server that you set up.
 LifeUp will add Google Drive backup support in the future.
 
 To protect your data privacy and reduce the using of the server, your local data will not be sync with the server, including:
 1. Local task data
 2. Local task history record
 3. Shop item data
 4. Local feelings data
 5. User achievements data
 6. Statistics data
 7. Settings
 
 The Data will be sync with the server, including:
 1. Exp points
 2. System achievements
 3. Team
 4. Team tasks completion record
 5. Team tasks activities

Stock Quantity Unlimited Custom There is not enough stock Own: %1$d (Stock Quantity: %2$d) Own: %1$d Sold Out Savings Balance: %1$d ATM ATM BACK DEPOSIT WITHDRAWAL Withdrawal %1$d coins Deposit %1$d coins Withdrawal successfully Withdrawal failed Deposit successfully Deposit failed Not enough saving balance CLOSE Weekly Basic WorkDay Special Basic Define:
Deadline: The deadline of the repeat cycle. It's not the end condition of the task. (Same for the Start Time)
Basically the deadline of a daily task should be set to [Today] while the deadline of a weekly task should be set to [Weekend].

Repeat Frequency: Daily, Weekly, Monthly etc.
When repeating a task, its start time and deadline will be calculated by the repeat frequency.

For example, when repeat a weekly task, its next start time will be 7 days after the current start time, same for the deadline.
In most cases, you can just set up the deadline and the repeat frequency as the start time can be auto calculated. How to setup a weekly task from [Monday] to [Sunday]?

Step 1. Set the "Repeat Frequency" to [Weekly]

Step 2.Set the "Deadline" to [Weekend](the date of the Sunday) How to setup a weekday task?

Step 1. Set the "Repeat Frequency" to [Daily]

Step 2.Click the "Ignore" Button to continue your setting How to setup a special task like a daily task that started at 18:00 of the day and deadline at the 4:00 of the second day?

Step 1. Click the [More Options] Button to show up the start time options

Step 2. Set the [Start Time] to the date of first day of the repeat, and set the time to "18:00"

Step 3. Set the [Deadline] to the date of the next day of the [Start Time], and then click the [Time] options the set up the specific time to "4:00"

Step 4.Set the "Repeat Frequency" to [Daily] Select Shop Item Text Only Reward Get Reward Item「%1$s」×%2$d Undo Reward Item「%1$s」×%2$d ATM - ATM
